mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, activity_id AS activityId, biz_id AS bizId, state, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM user_take_order WHERE biz_id = #{bizId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_take_order (user_id, activity_id, biz_id, state) VALUES (#{userId}, #{activityId}, #{bizId}, #{state})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_take_order SET state='USED' WHERE biz_id = #{bizId} AND state='CREATE'
